column6: In literary language there are some loanwords beginning with r but there are no inherited stems beginning with r. In Russian loans beginning with r-, xa- or ng- may be pronounced in some dialects (e.g. risuida-> xarisuida- (< рисовать), ngrajonnoj (< районный). In older loanwords r- may be replaced by l-.
